subject: Relationships
title: Male Friendships in Crisis
description: A short lesson to help you apply Male Friendships in Crisis.

hook.text: 15% of men have no close friends. The number has tripled since 1990. Men are in a friendship crisis.

buildup.text: Masculinity norms discourage emotional intimacy between men. Vulnerability is seen as weakness, not connection.

discovery.text: Men tend to bond through activities â€” sports, projects, shared tasks â€” rather than direct emotional sharing.

twist.text: The men who break the norm and share emotions with male friends report dramatically higher life satisfaction.

climax.text: The male friendship crisis isn't about men being broken. It's about a culture that punishes them for connecting.

punchline.text: Men aren't bad at friendship. They're punished for being good at it.
